page.title: 08DITTON PRIORS CHURCH.
page.content: 1986 is a very special year because it is {800 years}ago when the Church was built. The church is called{St John {the Baptist.}The roof is made out of 14th century timbers.The{furniture}in the Church was made in the 16th Century. The stained glass windows were made by the{Normans.}The ones with the crinkly edges were made by the{Elizabethans}and the rest were made by the{Victorians. The Vicar, the Rev.M.Harding looks after 5 Churches and one Chapel.The number of people attending Church each Sunday is between{45to 200.} To celebrate the {800th anniversary {of the Church}there is going to be a { {Festival}opened by {Lord Harewood.} events include Sports,a Barbecue, Dance,Flower Festival,Black Country Night Out,Wine Tasting,Bravarian Evening and other items.
